metaData.label: AE
metaData.criteriaDescription: ( CEG1 is True OR CEG2 is True ) AND ( Clic_C2 is True OR Clic_C3 is True )

metaData.label: Impacto_C4
metaData.criteriaDescription: ( ( CEG1 is True OR CEG2 is True ) AND ( Clic_C2 is False AND Clic_C3 is False ) ) OR ( ( CEG3 is True OR CEG4 is True ) AND ( Clic_C2 is True OR Clic_C3 is True ) )

metaData.label: Impacto_C5
metaData.criteriaDescription: ( CEG3 is True AND ( Clic_C2 is False AND Clic_C3 is False ) ) OR ( CEG4 is True AND Att_VC_1 is True AND Clic_C2 is False )
